name: Tihar
message: 🎉 Happy Tihar! Join us in celebrating this festival of lights!

name: Christmas
message: 🎄 Merry Christmas! Celebrate the season with us!

name: Dashain
message: 🐐 Happy Dashain! Celebrate Nepal’s greatest festival of joy and family gatherings!

name: Holi
message: 🌈 Happy Holi! Enjoy the festival of colors with love and joy!

name: New Year
message: 🎉 Happy New Year! Embrace new beginnings with joy!

name: Maghe Sankranti
message: 🍲 Happy Maghe Sankranti! Warm up with family and traditional foods!

name: Buddha Jayanti
message: 🕊️ Celebrate Buddha Jayanti, honoring the birth of Lord Buddha!

name: Janai Purnima
message: 📿 Happy Janai Purnima and Raksha Bandhan! Embrace the bond of protection.

name: Indra Jatra
message: 🌾 Celebrate Indra Jatra! Join in honoring the harvest and traditions of Kathmandu.

name: Chhath Puja
message: 🌅 Happy Chhath Puja! Worship the sun with faith and devotion.

name: Gai Jatra
message: 🐄 Celebrate Gai Jatra with us, a festival of remembrance and humor!

name: Teej
message: 🌹 Happy Teej! Celebrate the strength and resilience of women!
